text: @GavinNewsom There’ve been only 44 #COVID deaths in entire #OrangeCounty #DrWilliamBryan says #Covid19 #virus dies in 1.5 minutes in #sunlight yet you close #OCBeaches where ALL the overhead pictures I saw showed social distancing. You’re acting like a #king #dictator #fascist! #EndLockdown
